segments.text: I'm really upset about the mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are just making things worse by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading all over the floor, and it's just infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just waiting for a cookie, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to take control of this situation before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how no one is doing anything about the mess or the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're all in their own little worlds, not caring about the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just making me really mad.
segments.speaker: PAR
